settings.sub_heading_big: 3000 self-dissolving microcrystals for an "after-spa glow" and radiant skin
settings.review_text: “My skin felt more hydrated already after one use and got an immediate glow”

settings.tab_content_1:
With over 3000 innovative self-dissolving microcrystals which penetrate the deep layers of your skin in a non-invasive way, the Glow Roller effectively delivers Hyaluronic Acid and Triple Peptides and stimulates the skin's collagen production.

The anti-aging microcrystals will keep your skin young, making it firmer and more elastic, whether you use it on your face, neck, chin, or décolleté.

The Glow Roller represents an innovative and clinically-proven solution for elastic and radiant skin, reducing wrinkles, and moisturizing your skin with a visible effect from only a single application.
settings.tab_content_2:
✓ SAVE THOUSANDS! Never go to a beauty spa again.
✓ Safe, sanitary, non-invasive, easy to use, and painless (no physical needles, so no risk of skin damage).
✓ Keeps your skin young, making it firmer and elastic.
✓ Creates a healthy pro-collagen environment.
✓ Due to its self-dissolvable anti-aging microcrystals, it moisturizes your skin from within and reduces wrinkles and fine lines.
✓ Reduces transepidermal water loss and helps your skin look plumper and fresher with visible effects from only a single application.
✓ Offers a 300% better absorption of active ingredients.

settings.us-sub-title: For Early & Late Stage Spots. 162 Microcrystal & Hydrocolloid patches. Best Deal!

settings.sub_title:
Premium Skincare Therapy For an After-Spa Glow & Radiant Skin
PREORDER NOW SHIPS IN 60 DAYS

settings.text: OMMA is not just another skincare brand, its story roots deeply into my life and was created as a pinnacle of my healing journey, with the love and support of my husband and partner.

The Glow Roller uses microscopic anti-aging microcrystals made of active ingredients that self-dissolve in contact with the skin, while penetrating the deeper layers and delivering them to the target. There is no risk of damaging your skin or any sterilization needed, as each roller head is ready to be used immediately.
This is the major difference that makes the Glow Roller superior to all other dermarollers on the market, which have metallic, long needles that require sterilization after each use and have the high risk of damaging your skin.

settings.desc: Occurs naturally in the skin. It is an excellent moisture binder, hydrates and soothes the skin, and prevents moisture loss.

settings.title: 21% Triple Peptide Solution
settings.desc: Due to its anti-aging properties, it stimulates skin growth and repair by activating collagen production.

settings.title: Sodium Hyaluronate
settings.desc: Enters the deep layers of your skin having moisturizing and anti-inflammation effects. Excellent for reducing dryness and wrinkles.

settings.title: Text block
settings.text: Use these text blocks to promote seasonal sales, store events or to tell your brand's story.

settings.title: Why try the microcrystals Glow Roller?
settings.text:
Why not spoil and pamper yourself with premium skin therapy at home? Small things can make a big difference. So small that you can barely see them... That’s how tiny the Glow Roller microcrystals are.

And the big difference? Well, it's actually a double difference:

• Firstly, the 3000 noninvasive 250um microscopic microcrystals safely stimulate skin cell renewal and trigger collagen and elastin production.

• Secondly, unlike regular needle dermarollers, the Glow Roller has self-dissolving microcrystals which deliver active ingredients deep inside, restoring your skin glow from within.

settings.title: Why you'll love it?
settings.text: Microcrystals represent the new generation of innovations in acne care and we strongly believe in the technology and science behind the product and have created a unique active ingredients formula designed to be effective and that actually works.

settings.title: When to use the Glow Roller?
settings.text:
Aging is something we should embrace, but how we do it makes all the difference, and prolonging for as long as possible a healthy and youthful skin should be our focus.

The Glow Roller can help you prepare for a special event by giving you an instant glow, helps prevent wrinkles and fine lines if used regularly and effectively treats aging signs.

Used once or twice a week, the Glow Roller can maintain or restore your skin's natural glow.

settings.title: How to use the Glow Roller
settings.text:
Step 1
Cleanse and dry your face
You can use your prefered cleanser.

Step 2
Take one roller head out of the package and attach it to the roller. Massage your face with the roller for 5 ~ 10 minutes.
Once you start to gently massage your face, the microcrystals completely & rapidly penetrate your sking, dissolve and deliver the unique active ingredients formula and start working their magic.

Step 3
Apply serum and continue rolling for another 5 minutes.
(Dispose of roller head after use).
The serum brings extra helpfull ingredients which penetrate the skin much easier and faster.
By continuing to masage after the serum, you ensure all the roller microcrystals are completely dissolve and also push the serum more into your skin.

Use once or twice a week.

settings.title: What about the price?
settings.text:
The WOW patches are underpriced for something so effective and, in the long run, these will actually save you money! 

Just think about how much you’ll save by stopping using tiring acne routines with creams that struggle to reach deep below the skin.

settings.title: Free shipping & fulfillment info
settings.text:
•We currently offer free shipping for our standard shipping method.
•We ship from Salt Lake City and all orders are shipped using DHL, USPS or FEDEX
•These services are fully trackable once the couriers have your order.

Shipping fees:
•Standard shipping is FREE for all orders during the Official Launch.
•For Express shipping, a flat rate of $15 is charged at checkout.

Transit time:
•For Standard Free shipping, transit time is usually between 3 and 4 Business Days from the time your order is dispatched. 
•For Express shipping, transit time is usually between 1 and 2 Business Days from the time your order is dispatched. 

Processing time:
•All orders are processed pending availability and payment verification. •Orders are processed in max. 2 working days (orders placed between Friday, 2 pm, and 8 am Monday, will be processed starting on Monday).

settings.title: Why preorder it?
settings.text:
OMMA preorders are available for our most popular items so that you can reserve them before they arrive. 

Popular products frequently sell out before they arrive and the advantage is you'll benefit from a preorder major discount and also ensure that your item will be reserved.

Once the preorder period expires, these products are sold at full price. So, why not take advantage of the 50% preorder discount now?

When you place your order to confirm your reservation, your payment is processed and completed. 

The stimated shipping time is for 60 days. Preorders may be cancelled at any time prior to shipping. Let us know at support@ommacosmetics.com if you would like to cancel your preorder.

settings.title: Why made in South Korea?
settings.text:
Everyone knows South Korea is the innovator in the beauty space and no other comes close in this area.

K-Beauty cosmetics are world-wide renowned for a good reason, as they represent the perfect combination of science and the power of natural ingredients.

settings.title: Why buy from OMMA?
settings.text:
It's simple: because the products actually work!

OMMA is not just another skincare brand, its story roots deeply into my life and was created as a pinnacle of my healing journey. You can support a small business while also benefiting from great products crafted with care and passion.

I hope the products we carefully created will help you as much as they helped me.

settings.text:
OMMA represents the change love can have on your skin, in all its forms.

From feeling the love of your partner who supports you when you’re at your lowest, the love of a good friend who understands why you may be distant sometimes and encourages you to overcome your suffering, or the love you have for yourself, your body, your skin, just the way it is – understanding that it’s protecting you the way it knows best.
